summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to noise control, adding new Sections 25.08.068, 25.08.221, 25.08.501, 25.08.890, 25.08.900, 25.08.910, 25.08.915, 25.08.920, 25.08.930, 25.08.940, 25.08.950, 25.08.960, and 25.08.970 and directing the Executive to promulgate by rule noise standards consistent with sound level units of measurement prescribed by Council.
